reviews_ruslan_text: We needed to transcribe audio tracks from user-recorded video messages to create subtitles and a brief summary of the message. We calculated the cost of deploying Whisper on our own servers and immediately abandoned that idea in favor of Nexara. Integration took just one day. The team is always available and they areconstantly improving their API. Personally, I wish Nexara success!
reviews_vasil_text: Switching from OpenAI to Nexara allowed us to reduce transcription costs 5-fold simply by changing the API link. We got results effortlessly, literally the next day. The service works significantly faster than OpenAI Whisper, doesn't compromise on quality, and doesn't require using a VPN or transferring money to a foreign card. Recommend.
reviews_egor_text: I have my own audio and video transcription service — Transcribator. Initially, I used Whisper from OpenAI, but now I've switched to Nexara's solution. The cost decreased 3-fold, speed increased 2-fold without any additional optimization on my part, the quality remained high, and this is during Nexara's early development stage. I eagerly await the project's further development.
